    public class FlowerIsland
extends student.micro.jeroo.Island
    An island with either a fixed or random pattern of flowers for Lab 09.

    2021.09.12
    Author:
    Stephen Edwards

      • FlowerIsland

        public FlowerIsland()
        Initializes a newly created FlowerIsland object with a random pattern of flowers.

      • FlowerIsland

        public FlowerIsland​(int width,
                    int height)
        Initializes a newly created FlowerIsland object of a specific size with a fixed crosshatch pattern of flowers.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the island (including the surrounding water).
        height - The height of the island (including the surrounding water).

      • FlowerIsland

        public FlowerIsland​(int width,
                    int height,
                    double probability)
        Initializes a newly created FlowerIsland object of a specific size with a random arrangement of flowers.
        Parameters:
        width - The width of the island (including the surrounding water).
        height - The height of the island (including the surrounding water).
        probability - The chance than any individual cell will contain a flower.

    • Method Detail

      • plantFixedFlowers

        public void plantFixedFlowers()
        Plants a fixed crosshatch pattern of flowers on the island.

      • plantRandomFlowers

        public void plantRandomFlowers​(double probability)
        Plants a random pattern of flowers on the island.
        Parameters:
        probability - Chance that any given cell will contain a flower.
